translation.en: Hide.
[robot voice] Here we come! ♪ When Energon struck a Mall nearby ♪
translation.ko: - 우리가 간다! - 에너존이 쇼핑몰을 내리쳤을 때

translation.en: ♪ We became more than meets the eye ♪
translation.ko: 우린 눈에 보이는 것 이상의 존재가 됐어

translation.en: ♪ We're everyday objects, Motionless parts ♪
translation.ko: 우린 일상적인 물건 움직이지 않는 것들

translation.en: ♪ We burst to life to let the party start! ♪
♪ BotBots! We could be anything ♪
translation.ko: 갑자기 살아나며 파티가 시작됐어 봇봇! - 우린 뭐든 될 수 있어 - 봇봇!

translation.en: ♪ BotBots! Like a hot dog or ice cream ♪
translation.ko: - 우린 뭐든 될 수 있어 - 봇봇! - 핫도그도 아이스크림도 - 봇봇!

translation.en: ♪ BotBots! Mischief without a care ♪
translation.ko: - 핫도그도 아이스크림도 - 봇봇! - 천진난만한 장난 - 봇봇!

translation.en: ♪ BotBots! Secret robots everywhere ♪
translation.ko: - 천진난만한 장난 - 봇봇! - 사방에 비밀 로봇이 있어! - 봇봇!

translation.en: ♪ BotBots! Here we come!
translation.ko: - 사방에 비밀 로봇이 있어! - 봇봇! 우리가 간다!

translation.en: ♪ BotBots! BotBots! ♪
- BOTBOTS! - It's Bot Bot time, y'all!
"Operation: Secret Shindig" is online!
Ten-hut, soldier! Bombs away!
Fastball, right down the center!
Grand slam, baby!
Yeah, we're gonna do it! We're gonna whooaaa!
- [impact thud] - We did it!
The flesh creature's coming!
What in the world is going on here?
Ah, I thought I still had more episodes left.
How am I ever going to find more podcasts?
Ooohh, someone missed the can, huh?
Well, score one for Dave!
[gags in distaste] Ughh what flavor is that? Gross!
Fottle Barts - splatter power!
Thanks, Spud Muffin. Close call!
Come on, I fired up the fryer heat lamps.
Time to get our tans on!
Nah, tanning makes me peel.
Besides, Burgertron and I are
Wait - has anyone seen Burgertron?
Hmm, not since last night. Wonder where he went
Well, that was a bizarre series of embarrassing events
I never want to discuss. But now I can get back to
translation.ko: 말하기 창피하고 기이한 사건의 연속이었어 인제 그만 돌아가 보실…

translation.en: Wait. What is this awful place?
Oh, come on! Who are you? And why all the--
- [impact splat] - pain?
We're playing! We're just super super excited
translation.ko: 노는 거야! 새로운 사람을 만나서 너무 신나!

translation.en: to see someone new!
"Playing" isn't supposed to hurt!
- Wait what now? - Whoa!
BURGERTRON: I'm in the lost and found,
you're the "Lost Bots"? - No!
Yes. Maybe? What's a Lost Bot?
We've heard rumors about you, but I didn't think they were true.
translation.ko: 소문은 들었는데 진짜일 거라곤 생각 못 했어

translation.en: When the Energon cloud hit and we came to life,
translation.ko: 에너존 구름이 덮쳐 우리가 살아났을 때

translation.en: you were all stuck in here.
You probably don't even know about the rest of us
in the Mall! - You are saying a lot of words,
translation.ko: 쇼핑몰 친구들에 관해 모르지? 말 되게 많네, 대충 알겠는데

translation.en: and I know some of them, but I'm getting confused
translation.ko: 말 되게 많네, 대충 알겠는데 '쇼핑몰'이라든가 '생각' 이런 단어는 좀 헷갈려

translation.en: by words like "mall" and also "think".
Okay, first of all, I'm Burgertron.
Oooh! We have names too! I'm Dimlit, that's Kikmee, Bonz-Eye, and Clogstopper.
translation.ko: 우리도 이름 있어! 난 딤릿이고 킥미, 본즈아이, 클로그스타퍼야

translation.en: This room we're in is the "Lost & Found".
See? "You are here".
How does it know? How does the map know where we are?!
translation.ko: 어떻게 알지? 지도가 우리 위치를 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: But the rest of the Mall out here? This is the ENTIRE UNIVERSE!
translation.ko: 여길 뺀 쇼핑몰 전체가 우리 우주야!

translation.en: And all of us Bots belong to a different squad!
Like the Jock Squad! If all your shoes have cleats
translation.ko: 예를 들어 운동 팀! 미끄럼 방지 신발을 신었거나 스스로 그런 신발이라면

translation.en: or you actually are a shoe with cleats, this is your crew!
translation.ko: 미끄럼 방지 신발을 신었거나 스스로 그런 신발이라면 얘들이 네 팀원이야

translation.en: Then we've got the Sugar Shocks.
They talk three times faster than any of us
and I kinda get a stomachache just hanging out near them.
translation.ko: 난 얘들 근처에만 가도 배 아파

translation.en: The Gamer Geeks control all the Mall systems
so we're never on the Security Guard's monitors.
translation.ko: 덕분에 우린 경비원 모니터에 안 잡혀

translation.en: And then there's the Custodial Crew who
eh, actually you know what, the less I tell you about them,
the better to be honest. There's a bunch more squads,
translation.ko: 솔직히 얘들에 관해선 모를수록 좋아 여러 팀이 있지만 그중 가장 중요한 건

translation.en: but let's get to the most important one of all,
translation.ko: 여러 팀이 있지만 그중 가장 중요한 건

translation.en: the Hunger Hubs, who rule the Food Court,
led by their fearless and handsome leader, me!
translation.ko: 얘들의 리더는 용감하고 잘생긴, 바로 나!

translation.en: But I had a tiny mishap, and now I gotta get back.
translation.ko: 작은 사고가 있었지만 인제 돌아갈 거야

translation.en: My friends must be going nuts without the "Captain of Fun".
translation.ko: 재미 대장이 없으면 내 친구들은 미치거든

translation.en: That's what I-- they-- call me.
There's a "Jock Squad"?
A team of me's?! [excited gasp]
The thought alone just made me hit my daily step count!
Normally, I'd be suspicious of wild tales told by fried meat
translation.ko: 평소라면 튀긴 고기의 허황된 얘길 의심하겠지만

translation.en: but in my heart, I've always felt misplaced.
translation.ko: 여긴 내 자리가 아니란 생각이 늘 들었어

translation.en: As if I were distant from where I truly belong.
translation.ko: 있어야 할 곳에서 멀리 있는 느낌이랄까?

translation.en: Lost and forgotten.
The two words that describe us best.
translation.ko: 우릴 가장 잘 설명하는 두 단어지

translation.en: Oh that's sad! You should go find your Squads.
translation.ko: 너무 안됐다 네 팀을 찾아봐 만난 적도 없는 네 친구들

translation.en: You've got friends out there you've never even met yet!
translation.ko: 네 팀을 찾아봐 만난 적도 없는 네 친구들

translation.en: What is "friends"?
Friends is, are-- only the most important thing in the world!
Look, that's the sweet love of my life, Ulf the Orange
translation.ko: 봐! 내 인생에서 가장 달콤한 사랑인 얼프

translation.en: and my best-bro, Spud Muffin.
Together we're a supersized combo meal of happiness! Any-who, I gotta run. Bye!
translation.ko: 셋이 함께하면 초대형 해피 밀이지 암튼 난 가야겠다, 안녕!

translation.en: Oh, wait!
translation.ko: 기다려! 평생 난 팀이 없는 팀 플레이어였어!

translation.en: My whole life I've been a team player without a team!
translation.ko: 평생 난 팀이 없는 팀 플레이어였어!

translation.en: I wanna come with you and find where I belong!
translation.ko: 함께 가서 내가 있을 곳을 찾을래

translation.en: I do as well. For too long, I've been a warrior without a cause.
translation.ko: 나도, 난 너무 오랫동안 명분 없는 전사였어

translation.en: And I've been a flashlight!
What? Aren't we just listing stuff that we were?
translation.ko: 왜? 우리 신분을 밝히는 거 아니었어?

translation.en: Alright then, to our squads!
Seriously how does it know?!
translation.ko: 아, 진짜 어떻게 우리 위치를 아는 거지?

translation.en: All clear. Stealth mission: Go.
Take cover!
I must imagine what I want the most, repeat five times. I must imagine what I want the most, repeat five times.
Wait, was I supposed to say that last part?
- [Bonz-eye] It's horrible! - Okay.
translation.ko: 끔찍해 좋아, 방금 너희가 배운 건

translation.en: Time you all learned--
[dramatic voice] -- The Sacred Rule of the Mall!
No Bot may ever, I repeat, EVER,
translation.ko: 봇은 어떤 경우든… 반복할게, 어떤 경우든 존재를 인간에게 들켜선 안 돼, 알겠어?

translation.en: reveal to the flesh beings that we exist. Got it?
translation.ko: 반복할게, 어떤 경우든 존재를 인간에게 들켜선 안 돼, 알겠어?

translation.en: But that creature seems nice.
Nice? That thing EATS burgers!
translation.ko: 착하다고? 햄버거도 먹고 화초 가지도 치고 축구공도 차

translation.en: And prunes plants! And kicks soccer balls!
translation.ko: 햄버거도 먹고 화초 가지도 치고 축구공도 차

translation.en: And let me tell you, you do NOT want to know what it does
translation.ko: 뚫어뻥으로 뭘 하는지는 알고 싶지도 않을걸

translation.en: with plungers!
translation.ko: 뚫어뻥으로 뭘 하는지는 알고 싶지도 않을걸 손전등으로는 뭘 하는데?

translation.en: What does it do with flashlights?
Well it I mean, it just kinda holds them.
I would like to be held.
No! Trust me, if we ever even came close to revealing
translation.ko: 안 돼! 공기로 숨 쉬고 가스를 내뿜는 자들에게

translation.en: our existence to that air-breathing gas-emitter,
translation.ko: 안 돼! 공기로 숨 쉬고 가스를 내뿜는 자들에게 우리 존재를 들키는 날엔

translation.en: there would be MAJOR consequences!
So, we've gotta get from down here up to the second floor
translation.ko: 그러니 들키지 않고 여기서 2층 푸드코트로 가야 해, 알겠어?

translation.en: Food Court without being spotted. Copy?
Yeah, I don't see how we're getting past
translation.ko: 이 수비를 어떻게 뚫을지 모르겠어, 코치

translation.en: this defense, coach. - Never fear.
translation.ko: 이 수비를 어떻게 뚫을지 모르겠어, 코치 겁내지 마

translation.en: If there's one thing you learn from a brilliant leader like me,
translation.ko: 나 같은 훌륭한 대장에게 배울 게 하나 있다면

translation.en: Lost Bots - never give up!
translation.ko: 나 같은 훌륭한 대장에게 배울 게 하나 있다면 '포기하지 말라'야!

translation.en: I have an idea that cannot fail!
- Alright, Lost Bots-- ready? - [Lost Bots] Ready!
- Soup! - Floor it, Kikmee!
Hold on tight!
As long as we keep quiet, nothing can go wrong!
translation.ko: 조용히 있으면 아무 일도 없을 거야

translation.en: - Why?! - The flesh being.
- THE FLESH BEING! - [dramatic gasp]
Nevermind, false alarm.
WAIT! Some sort of metal jaws of death!
- [panicked yelps] - I accept my fate.
Don't worry, that's just the escalator.
Those metal jaws of life will lead us
translation.ko: 삶의 금속 턱이 우릴 푸드코트로 안내할 거야

translation.en: right to the Food Court, as smooth a ride as--
translation.ko: 삶의 금속 턱이 우릴 푸드코트로 안내할 거야 아주 편안하게…

translation.en: See? [voice vibrating] Told you Smooth
Can you say flawless?
[Dave] What in the living heck!
[Dave] Why are a plant, a flashlight, a plunger,
translation.ko: 왜 화초랑 손전등, 뚫어뻥 축구공이 기차 안에 있지?

translation.en: and a soccer ball on a train?! Do they even have tickets?!
translation.ko: 왜 화초랑 손전등, 뚫어뻥 축구공이 기차 안에 있지? 승차권은 산 거야?

translation.en: [dramatic gasp] An abandoned burgery?!
Oh,my self affirmation podcast was right!
I imagined what I wanted most - and it came true!
translation.ko: 가장 원하는 걸 상상했더니 현실이 됐잖아

translation.en: [Burgertron] And so this is how I,
the beloved hero Burgertron, will meet my end.
translation.ko: 이것이 나, 사랑받는 영웅 버거트론이 최후를 맞는 방법이야

translation.en: Goodbye sweet mall, remember me
translation.ko: 잘 있어, 착한 쇼핑몰, 날 기억해

translation.en: Little robots?! Gah!
Ah, there's no way you imagined that, right, Dave?
I mean those were robots in disguise?
Oh no, gotta get this thing back
translation.ko: 맙소사 나한테 책임을 못 묻게 자리에 갖다 두자, 출발

translation.en: before I get blamed for this mess! Okay, Lets go.
translation.ko: 나한테 책임을 못 묻게 자리에 갖다 두자, 출발

translation.en: [Dave] Ah this music is giving me circus camp flashbacks.
translation.ko: 이 음악을 들으니 서커스 캠프가 생각나

translation.en: Guessing that wasn't part of the plan, coach?
Thanks for the save, Dimlit, but unfortunately we just broke--
translation.ko: 구해준 건 고마운데 우린 방금 위반했어

translation.en: -- The Sacred Rule of the Mall.
Spud Muffin! Ulf! Uh
Didja miss me?! Course you did. But I'm back! Yay!
translation.ko: 나 보고 싶었어? 당연하지 내가 돌아왔어, 만세!

translation.en: Don't "yay" us! Total jerk-move you just pulled,
translation.ko: '만세' 하지 마 완전 얼간이 같은 짓을 해서 인간한테 모습을 들켜?

translation.en: revealing yourself to a flesh creature! Unforgivable.
translation.ko: 완전 얼간이 같은 짓을 해서 인간한테 모습을 들켜? 용서 못 해!

translation.en: You were the last bot I'd ever expect to give away our secret.
translation.ko: 너만큼은 우리 비밀을 지킬 줄 알았는데

translation.en: What have you become, Burgie?
Oh! You saw that? Well, uh,
translation.ko: 다 봤구나? 너희만 봐서 다행이야 다른 애들이 봤으면…

translation.en: at least it was just you guys. Oh man, if the others had--
translation.ko: 너희만 봐서 다행이야 다른 애들이 봤으면…

translation.en: Oh.. hey good news!
translation.ko: 그래, 안녕 좋은 소식이야 재미 대장이 돌아왔어

translation.en: The Captain of Fun's back! Passport for carousing!
translation.ko: 좋은 소식이야 재미 대장이 돌아왔어 흥청망청행 여권

translation.en: Passport revoked bro-mide.
You broke the only rule we have!
A flesh being knows we exist!
That puts Mall life in jeopardy.
Consider yourself out of the Hunger Hubs.
And I seriously doubt anyone else is gonna wanna hang with you now
translation.ko: 너랑 놀고 싶은 사람은 이제 아무도 없을 거야

translation.en: or with your weird new friends!
translation.ko: 네가 새로 사귄 이상한 친구들과 같이 떠나

translation.en: He called us your "weird friends".
Yeah, sorry about that.
That means "Weird Most Important Thing In The World"!
No one has ever said anything nicer to us!
I know! And did you see that other ball? And that bat?
translation.ko: 내 말이! 저기 다른 공 봤어? 방망이는?

translation.en: There really are squads for all of us!
I'm maxxed out on excitement! I'm in the ZONE!
translation.ko: 난 완전 흥분 상태야! 뿅 갔다고!

translation.en: But your squads won't want to take you back now!
translation.ko: 하지만 너희를 끼워주려 하지 않을 거야!

translation.en: I ruined everything!
Your plan did not go like you hoped.
And your friends rejected you.
And you were humiliated in front of everyone you've ever known
but didn't a "brilliant" leader teach us to "never give up"?
translation.ko: 하지만 훌륭한 대장이 포기하지 말라고 하지 않았어?

translation.en: Yeah. Can't we try again tomorrow?
translation.ko: 그래, 내일 다시 해보면 안 돼?

translation.en: You know, you're right.
This is just a setback. A big one, sure,
translation.ko: 이건 차질일 뿐이야 물론 큰 차질이지만 이건 시작에 불과해!

translation.en: but this is only the beginning!
translation.ko: 물론 큰 차질이지만 이건 시작에 불과해!

translation.en: No one'll believe I saw them-- yet.
translation.ko: 내가 본 걸 아무도 안 믿을 거야, 아직은

translation.en: But there is no way they'll escape my brilliant and cunning plans!
translation.ko: 로봇이 내 교활한 계획을 피할 방법은 없어!

translation.en: This is only the beginning!
- [impact thud] - Mommy?
Nothing like rousing kazoo music to get the Energon pumping!
translation.ko: 에너존의 기운을 북돋우는 카주 음악만큼 좋은 건 없어!

translation.en: Burgertron why?
You Lost Bots probably aren't used to getting up
translation.ko: 분실 봇들은 쇼핑몰 문 닫을 때 일어나는 게 익숙하지 않겠지만

translation.en: at the crack of closing, but if we're going to get accepted back
translation.ko: 분실 봇들은 쇼핑몰 문 닫을 때 일어나는 게 익숙하지 않겠지만 각자의 팀으로 돌아가려면 낭비할 시간이 없다는 말씀

translation.en: by our squads, we have no time to waste.
translation.ko: 각자의 팀으로 돌아가려면 낭비할 시간이 없다는 말씀

translation.en: We need the perfect plan.
- And guess what? - You're a ventriloquist!
What? Why would--?
I have the perfect plan! Follow me!
No one ever asks if I'm a ventriloquist.
You aren't.
Hey bros, bro-ettes, various bro-dentities.
Spud Muffin here, just doin' what I do, NBD.
translation.ko: 난 스퍼드 머핀이야 평소대로 멋짐 뿜뿜

translation.en: Check it: COUCH SURFING!
See? If there's one thing all the Bots love, it's a dope BotVid.
translation.ko: 봤지? 봇들이 좋아하는 게 있다면 그건 멋진 봇영상이야

translation.en: Totally. And that Spud Muffin is a hunk!
translation.ko: 그러게 저 스퍼드 머핀 완전 잘생겼어!

translation.en: What poise! What charm!
Yeah, he's got sort of a sidekick charm maybe.
But that's not the point. Look at how everybody loves BotVids!
translation.ko: 상관없어, 다들 봇영상을 얼마나 좋아하는지 봐!

translation.en: Uh, cool Bots make BotVids.
We're not cool Bots, remember?
translation.ko: 우린 쿨한 봇이 아니잖아 기억 안 나?

translation.en: Well, not YET! Sure, you're a little weird,
and one of you, not saying who, is distractingly unhygienic
translation.ko: 누군지 말은 안 하겠지만 너희 중 하나는 지저분해

translation.en: He could mean anybody really.
but once we make BotVids for each of you and get them to play on that moving wall,
translation.ko: 하지만 너희의 봇영상을 만들어 이동 벽에서 보여주면

translation.en: your generalized greatness will be apparent
and all the Squads will forget about how much they hate us! You in?
translation.ko: 모든 팀은 우릴 미워한단 사실도 잊을 거야, 같이 할래?

translation.en: A half-shrug of acceptance? That's all I need!
translation.ko: 반만 으쓱하는 건 찬성의 뜻? 그거면 돼

translation.en: Whoa! What are all these things?
Emm no idea. Nerd stuff?
Who you calling nerd, nerd?
Fomo! These are who I was telling you about!
Oh, I know. Everyone knows about you "Lost Bots".
translation.ko: 그래, 알아 분실 봇들에 관해선 모두가 알지

translation.en: Echh. I can't believe you broke The Sacred Rule!
translation.ko: 신성한 규칙을 어기다니 믿을 수가 없어!

translation.en: Okay, well Fomo here is gonna film your BotVids for you.
translation.ko: 알았어 포모가 너희들 봇영상을 찍어줄 거야

translation.en: Hold up on the thanks, loser-trons.
Fomo is in this for Fomo!
Yeah, I did not become the top influencer in Mall
translation.ko: 자선 사업으로 쇼핑몰 최고의 영향력자가 된 게 아니라고

translation.en: by helping others. - "Influencer"?
translation.ko: 자선 사업으로 쇼핑몰 최고의 영향력자가 된 게 아니라고 영향력자?

translation.en: What do you make people do?
I make 'em watch sick BotVids.
My lifestyle is my brand!
Which means I need content, content, content.
That is the only reason I'm willing to slum it with you pariahbots.
translation.ko: 그래서 너희 같은 왕따 봇을 상대해 주는 거야

translation.en: You seem rude but say cool words.
translation.ko: 건방진 녀석인데 말하는 게 쿨하니까 상관없어!

translation.en: So I guess that makes it ok?
Let's go with that. Now go. Shoot great stuff.
translation.ko: 좋은 자세야 인제 가서 멋진 영상을 찍어 개성을 뽐내!

translation.en: Show off your personalities!
translation.ko: 인제 가서 멋진 영상을 찍어 개성을 뽐내!

translation.en: Don't worry! Just be yourselves!
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 있는 그대로 보여주면 돼

translation.en: No, seriously, they were little robots!
translation.ko: 아니, 진짜예요 쇼핑몰에 작은 로봇들이 있다고요!

translation.en: - In the mall! - [hysteric laughter on phone]
Awh, stop laughing! It's not funny!
One of them was a cheeseburger!
- [laughter intensifies] - Aw yeah ok, laugh, laugh. You'll see!
Man. My Mom sure can be mean.
Once you catch one of those Bots in a trap, Dave,
everyone your mom, your boss, that misinformed bus driver,
translation.ko: 그 봇을 잡기만 해, 데이브 그럼 엄마, 보스 엉뚱한 길로 간 버스 운전사

translation.en: they'll all have to believe you!
Building this should be easy
Yeah, yeah. Easy.
Alright! Ready to show me the gold you captured on video?
Yep! We were kinda nervous at first,
translation.ko: 좋아 처음엔 좀 긴장했는데 결과에 대만족이야

translation.en: but we're really proud of what we got.
Can't wait. Lay it on me!
When does it start?
"Hashtag Kittens?!" Why did it say "Hashtag Kittens?!"
Everybody loves kittens!
You just erased my brain. What were you doing in that video?
translation.ko: 방금 내 뇌가 삭제됐어 이 영상에서 뭘 하는 거야?

translation.en: "The Standing Completely Still Challenge"!
Everybody also loves stuff that ends in "challenge!"
Okay.. I there are no words.
Who's next? Please be good.
Alright! This is more like it!
Enlightening, is it not? My blade is so sharp,
translation.ko: 새로운 경험이지? 내 칼날은 날카로워서 현실이란 개념도 자를 수 있어

translation.en: it can slice through our concept of reality itself.
translation.ko: 내 칼날은 날카로워서 현실이란 개념도 자를 수 있어

translation.en: The end might be a little off-putting.
Well, mine's ON-PUTTING!
Roll em, Fomo!
[Clogstopper] The weight of the world got you down?
Feeling lonely? Listless?
Friendship with Clogstopper can help!
Friendship with Clogstopper can brighten your day with joy!
Ask your doctor if Friendship with Clogstopper
translation.ko: 클로그스타퍼와 친구 해도 될지 의사한테 물어봐

translation.en: is right for you! Mild to serious side effects
translation.ko: 클로그스타퍼와 친구 해도 될지 의사한테 물어봐 부작용으로는 위험한 곰팡이, 설사

translation.en: of Friendship with Clogstopper include random exposure
to dangerous fungi, loose stool, and emotional irritation.
translation.ko: 부작용으로는 위험한 곰팡이, 설사 짜증 폭발이 있어

translation.en: So? Best one? Or better than best?
Don't decide yet!
Why would you do that?!
What? It's a fun, sporty prank!
You probably just enraged half the Mall!
For real. Y'all are more hated than ever.
Yeah, hers didn't really work out. But the rest--
Masterpieces, right?
Master pieces of garbage!
Those are the worst BotVids ever made!
What were you all thinking?
translation.ko: 최악의 봇영상이라고! 왜 그랬어? 네가 말한 대로 있는 그대로를 보여줬어

translation.en: We were doing what you told us. Just being ourselves.
translation.ko: 네가 말한 대로 있는 그대로를 보여줬어

translation.en: I didn't mean your REAL selves!
I meant your better, cooler, FAKE selves that people might actually like!
translation.ko: 사람들이 좋아하는 더 멋진 가짜 모습을 말한 거야!

translation.en: How could you mess up such a simple, clear instruction?!
translation.ko: 어떻게 그렇게 간단한 지시를 망칠 수 있어?

translation.en: Look. It's my fault.
I should've directed this project myself.
Let's just head to the South Wing,
translation.ko: 남관으로 가자 새로운 걸 생각해 볼게

translation.en: I'll think of something new. - Yeah, we can't go there.
translation.ko: 남관으로 가자 새로운 걸 생각해 볼게 거긴 못 가 인간이 덫을 놓고 있어

translation.en: That's where the flesh creature is setting up his traps.
translation.ko: 거긴 못 가 인간이 덫을 놓고 있어

translation.en: His WHAT NOW?!
And they rejected your application to the Engineering Academy, Dave.
translation.ko: 공대에서 널 거부한 거 기억나, 데이브?

translation.en: - Well, their loss. - [stopwatch beeps]
Ah! I'm late for my rounds!
Is that a new amusement park?
They're traps!
- They are PERFECT! - Explain.
Well, whereas you all see danger,
I see opportunity!
If we can beat these traps, we'll not only protect
translation.ko: 이 덫을 물리치면 다른 봇을 지킬 뿐 아니라

translation.en: all the other bots, we will look incredibly amazing as we do it
translation.ko: 이 덫을 물리치면 다른 봇을 지킬 뿐 아니라 정말 멋있어 보일 거야

translation.en: on video!
And when our Squads all see it, they'll be BEGGING us to join them!
translation.ko: 우리 팀이 그걸 보면 돌아와 달라고 애걸할걸!

translation.en: Look, these are called "traps" which makes me think there will be some kind of "trapping".
translation.ko: 이건 덫이라며? 그럼 뭔가를 잡는 도구란 건데

translation.en: What if WE get trapped?
Well, you're certainly not gonna beat the traps
with that attitude! Now let's get started,
translation.ko: 그런 태도로는 덫을 물리치지 못해 자, 시작하자 인간의 순찰 시간은 20분이야

translation.en: the flesh being's rounds only take twenty minutes.
Uhm why are there loose bolts here?
And batteries in a jar?
translation.ko: 병 속에 웬 배터리? 기름 아니야?

translation.en: And oil?
You gotta be kidding me. They're lures!
These are robot stereotypes! Come on!
Does he really think we eat nuts and bolts?
translation.ko: 우리가 정말 나사를 먹는 줄 아나?

translation.en: Is it possible the flesh creature built these with a blindfold on?
translation.ko: 인간이 눈을 가린 채 만든 게 아닐까?

translation.en: Oh good! We don't have to do this!
translation.ko: - 잘됐다, 이거 안 해도 돼 - 못 됐어!

translation.en: Bad! We need these traps to work
translation.ko: 모두를 놀라게 하려면 이 덫이 필요해

translation.en: if we're going to impress everyone.
translation.ko: 모두를 놀라게 하려면 이 덫이 필요해 그래서? 영상 하나 찍으려고 제대로 다시 만들어서

translation.en: So? It's not like we're gonna rebuild them properly
translation.ko: 그래서? 영상 하나 찍으려고 제대로 다시 만들어서

translation.en: and put ourselves in more danger just to look better on video.
translation.ko: 우릴 더 큰 위험에 빠트릴 순 없어

translation.en: Yeah! Great idea! Let's do that!
Hey, great work! We should think about applying to an Engineering Academy.
[gasp] We have our first viewer!
BotBots.
This is only the beginning! Once we make this BotVid,
translation.ko: 이건 시작에 불과해 봇영상이 완성되면 사인해 달라고 난리일걸!

translation.en: you'll be signing autographs for everyone!
No. I will never write my own name.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 난 내 이름은 절대 안 써

translation.en: Ack! The flesh beast is only three minutes away!
We have to make our cinematic masterpiece!
- Let's go! - Woah, watch it, coach!
translation.ko: 걸작 영화를 만들어야 해, 가자! 조심해, 코치! 기름이야

translation.en: - Oil slick. - Good catch, Kikmee.
translation.ko: 조심해, 코치! 기름이야 잘했어, 킥미 이제 모두 자리로 가!

translation.en: Now everyone, on your ones!
translation.ko: 잘했어, 킥미 이제 모두 자리로 가!

translation.en: - Fomo, you ready? - Readier than you dweebs.
translation.ko: 포모, 준비됐어? 너희 샌님들보다 더 준비됐지

translation.en: Okaaay hit record!
Hey bots! BT here,
translation.ko: 이봐, 봇들! 나 BT야 인간이 우릴 잡으려고

translation.en: and we couldn't help but notice the flesh creature set up
translation.ko: 이봐, 봇들! 나 BT야 인간이 우릴 잡으려고 덫을 잔뜩 설치했어

translation.en: a series of traps for all of us. OH NO!
translation.ko: 덫을 잔뜩 설치했어 안 돼! 하지만 걱정 마

translation.en: But never fear
your brave and indisputably cool heroes are here to shut this down.
translation.ko: 용감하고 쿨한 영웅들이 덫을 없애줄 테니까

translation.en: We're really doin' it! We're actually coool!
And that is a wrap on the traps!
YES! MONEY! Oh!
This'll be the way sickest BotVid yet!
That was amazing! There is no way we don't look coo [splat]
Huh. The traps went off, but no robots?
I built these perfectly, so--
WHAT?!
Oh YES!
translation.ko: 좋았어! 이걸 보고도 웃지 그래요, 엄마?

translation.en: Why don't you laugh at this mom. Laugh with your face, laugh--
translation.ko: 좋았어! 이걸 보고도 웃지 그래요, 엄마? 실컷 웃어요, 실컷…

translation.en: -- at me for another night.
I'll find you robots, I swear.
Thanks for the save, Bonz-Eye. Now let's see how the other Bots react!
translation.ko: 구해줘서 고마워, 본즈아이 이제 다른 봇들의 반응을 보자!

translation.en: Are you showing it? Our brilliance? Our transcendent filmic experience?
translation.ko: 우리의 멋짐을 보여주고 있어? 탁월한 영화적 경험을?

translation.en: Better b-b-believe! I got it on loop!
What is this? This isn't us!
No, it's BETTER!
I have a keen eye for fails,
and when I saw Sprinkleberry headed for that oil,
oooh, I knew exactly where the MONEY was!
[DIMLIT] Hey, look at the bright side, sir.
Sure, no one saw it, but we DID beat all those traps.
translation.ko: 아무도 못 봤지만 우린 덫을 물리쳤어

translation.en: And we did it by being ourselves!
Which was your idea if I remember.
You know, good point.
It's not our fault other bots don't have discerning taste
translation.ko: 봇들이 안목이 없는 건 우리 잘못이 아니야

translation.en: and will laugh at the stupidest stuff on a BotViii--.
Uh, hashtag kittens?
